recipes.name: Indian Curry
ingredients: 1 cup chopped veggies (potato, carrots, peas, cauliflower)
1 cup water or light coconut milk
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté onions until golden.
Add garlic and ginger; cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Stir in spices and cook for 2 minutes.
Add veggies and water or coconut milk. Cover and simmer until veggies are tender (15–20 minutes).
Garnish with coriander and serve.

recipes.name: Veg Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus and mashed avocado on the wrap.
Layer with veggies and greens.
Season with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon.
Roll tightly and slice in half.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad
ingredients: 2 tbsp Greek yogurt or light mayo
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Serve on lettuce leaves, whole grain toast, or as is.

recipes.name: Chickpea Bowl
ingredients: ½ cup quinoa or brown rice
½ cup chopped cucumber and tomato
instructions: Arrange cooked ingredients in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, and seasoning.
Toss gently and top with herbs.

recipes.name: Rice Veg
ingredients: 1 cup cooked brown or white rice
1 tsp sesame oil or olive oil
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic.
Add vegetables, cook until tender.
Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and stir well.
Serve hot, optionally with green onions on top.

recipes.name: Egg Muffin
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a bowl, whisk eggs, milk, salt, pepper.
Stir in chopped veggies and cheese (if using).
Pour into muffin tin (lightly greased).
Bake for 18–20 mins until set.
Cool slightly before serving or refrigerate for grab-and-go.

recipes.name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
instructions: Spiralize the zucchinis or use pre-spiralized ones.
Heat olive oil in a pan, lightly sauté zucchini noodles for 2–3 mins.
Remove from heat and toss with pesto, cherry tomatoes, salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Top with Parmesan and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon with Veggies
ingredients: Salt, pepper, garlic powder, herbs (like dill or thyme)
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place salmon and veggies on the tray, drizzle with olive oil, and season.
Add lemon slices on top of salmon.
Bake for 20 mins or until salmon is flaky and veggies are tender.

recipes.name: Stuffed Sweet Potato
ingredients: 1/4 cup Greek yogurt or sour cream
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Wash and poke holes in sweet potatoes.
Bake for 30–35 mins until soft.
Mix black beans with cumin, salt, and lime juice.
Slice sweet potatoes open and mash slightly.
Fill with beans, avocado, yogurt, and herbs. Sprinkle chili flakes and serve hot.
